sentences.en: Afghanistan and Pakistan , who will remain key strategic allies for Obama, were more fulsome.
sentences.cn: 仍将是奥巴马关键战略盟友的阿富汗和巴基斯坦, 则显得过分恭维了.

sentences.en: He was fulsome in his praise of the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 他称赞首相时有溢美之词。

sentences.en: He was too fulsome in his praise.
Her advice includes perfectly true but rather fulsome pearls of wisdom.
sentences.cn: 她的建议中有完全正确的金玉良言，但有过于恭维之嫌。

sentences.en: However, fulsome pressure maybe take people to extremity, even giving up their life.
sentences.cn: 然而, 过大的压力可能会使人走向极端, 甚至放弃人生.

sentences.en: I was disgusted by her fulsome flattery.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌她那套令人作呕的奉承.

sentences.en: I was disgusted by his fulsome flattery.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌他那过分的谄媚.

sentences.en: Newspapers have been fulsome in their praise of the former president.
sentences.cn: 报纸上对前总统都是些溢美之词。

sentences.en: Strategies vary from innovative bottle design and unusual ingredients through to fulsome use of celebrity endorsement.
sentences.cn: 其策略各有不同,从创新性的包装设计和独特成分到大量使用名人签名.

sentences.en: They tried to please him with fulsome compliments and extravagant gifts.
sentences.cn: 他们想用溢美之词和奢华的礼品来取悦他.

sentences.en: What's your idea fulsome intervene from superior?
sentences.cn: 上司过多干预部门工作怎么办?

sentences.en: Xia zhi xing: you are really too fulsome.
sentences.cn: 夏之星: 你真的很过分.

trans.tran_en: If you describe expressions of praise, apology, or gratitude as fulsome, you disapprove of them because they are exaggerated and elaborate, so that they sound insincere
